attributes.action: Make all sanitary products free for women
attributes.additional_details: Women are being held back from having access to something they need purely because they can’t afford it. People having to use tissue as a pad should never be an option.
attributes.background: Why should we have to pay for something that we didn’t ask for? People have side effects from contraception which leads them to have uncontrollable bleeding or spotting for days/weeks so they’re forced to buy multiple packs of products which people can’t afford

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/555551
